short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Link to the Yahoo! finance page from a Twitter / X cashtag

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitter uses cashtags (e.g., '$GOOG') in tweets to reference stocks, but there's no easy way to get current information about the stock from a cashtag. This extension modifies the twitter page so that when you hover over a cashtag a tool-tip appears with a link to the Yahoo! finance page for the stock.

The extension makes it much easier to get additional context about a stock that a tweet is discussing.

(There's no affiliation between this extension and Twitter or Yahoo!)
